Review.Title: This product is amazing!!!
Review.ReviewText: Hands down, my favorite, on-the-go, healthy snack is a LARABAR. When I opened my box to find the chocolate chip cookie dough bar I shrieked! Literally. It was pretty good. I don't eat many bars like that, so it was nice to be able to try it before buying it.

Review.Title: I'm love with this
Review.ReviewText: I love food samples especially if they are all natural or organic. I am currently switching my food intake to all natural and organic. This is a nice way to get a nice snack/chocolate in without having to stray from goals. Thank you, I really liked it!

Review.Title: It was alright.
Review.ReviewText: This is the first edible "extra"" that I didn't like. The taste wasn't very good (I had the coconut cream pie one- sounded promising) and the texture was repulsive. At least I know never to purchase one of these bars in the future! :)"
